Phase 1: Develop MVP and validate product-market fit
Phase 2: Scale technology platform and launch in target market
Phase 3: Expand market presence and drive innovation

Risk 1: Technology scalability and performance issues
Risk 2: Market competition and technology disruption
Risk 3: Security vulnerabilities and data breaches

The quality assurance framework includes quality metrics and quality standards. The quality metrics are system uptime, user satisfaction, technology performance, and security compliance. The quality standards are KPMG standards.

Phase 1: Weeks 1-4, Development team
Phase 2: Weeks 5-8, Marketing team
Phase 3: Weeks 9-12, Sales team

The success metrics and KPIs include primary success, secondary success, and quality metrics. The primary success is successful technology platform launch and market adoption. The secondary success is user engagement and technology performance excellence. The quality metrics are system uptime, user satisfaction, technology performance, and security compliance.

The recommendations and next steps include completing all phases, improving timeline management, launching full market rollout, and establishing customer success and support infrastructure.
